properties.entry: SELECT MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , EMAIL , ENROLL_DATE , STATUS , MEM_CODE , SH_NAME , SH_PHONE , SH_ADDRESS , SH_ABOUT , ADMISSION , SH_LOCAL , REF_TYPE FROM MEMBER LEFT JOIN SHELTER USING(MEM_NO) WHERE MEM_ID = ? AND MEM_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT INTO MEMBER ( MEM_NO , MEM_ID , MEM_PWD , MEM_NAME , EMAIL , MEM_CODE , STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_UNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , ? , 'N' )
